name: Cardcaptor Sakura: Sakura to Fushigi na Clow Card
overview: The WonderSwan version of Cardcaptor Sakura is a game that recreates the Clow Card Arc from the TV series, and uses a multi-ending system where the scenario changes depending on the events. The characters you meet and the events that occur will change depending on your "Friendliness" meter (over 120 different events in total), and the scenarios will branch out one after another! You can also use the "Clow Card Battle" feature to battle against friends by building a deck with the Clow cards you've acquired during the game.
